module.name: activity_method
module.purpose:
The Activity_method application module supports the requirement to textually describe the method by which an activity is to be performed.
The Activity_method module provides a foundation for more detailed approaches to specifying how activities is to be performed.

inscope.li: The consequences of the activity method;
The description of the activity method;
The purpose of the activity method.

outscope.li: The scheduling and planning of an activity.

uof.name: Activity_Method
uof.description: The Activity_Method UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept describing the method by which an activity will be performed.
